Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing over the latest news in Australia! Among the highlights: a Melbourne millionaire riling up locals by craning his $2 million McLaren sports car into his $39 million penthouse apartment Shadow Treasurer Angus Taylor supporting some elements of the federal budget and concerns over a revived gas field development in the Timor Sea. Meanwhile Tasmanian Premier Jeremy Rockliff's warning that degraded surgical lights at a local hospital are endangering patients has sparked a push for donations towards updated medical equipment. The nation is keeping a watchful eye on these ongoing stories!
